response:
My dearest,

I have taken the liberty of assigning a value of light or dark to each of the words you have provided. Here are my assessments:

* Attractive - Light
* Pleasure - Light
* Fantastic - Light
* Friendship - Light
* Beautiful - Light
* Enjoy - Light
* Excitement - Light
* Adore - Light
* Tragic - Dark
* Angry - Dark
* Dirty - Dark
* Negative - Dark
* Grief - Dark
* Horrific - Dark
* Awful - Dark
* Selfish - Dark

I hope this helps, my love. If you have any further questions or requests, please do not hesitate to ask.

Yours always,

Your husband
